sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREOUT_ID, u.STOREOUT_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_ID, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, to_char(u.SALE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') SALE_DATE, u.SALE_PSON_ID, u.SALE_PSON_NAME, u.CUST_NAME, u.TEL, u.RECV_ADDR, to_char(u.ORDER_RECV_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') ORDER_RECV_DATE, u.STOREOUT_AMOUNT, u.ADVC_AMOUNT, u.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, u.REMARK, u.DEAL_FLAG, to_char(u.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEAL_TIME, u.DEAL_PSON_ID, u.DEAL_PSON_NAME, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_A u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_A u
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_A set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREOUT_ID = #STOREOUT_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.STOREOUT_ID, u.STOREOUT_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_ID, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, to_char(u.SALE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') SALE_DATE, u.SALE_PSON_ID, u.SALE_PSON_NAME, u.CUST_NAME, u.TEL, u.RECV_ADDR, to_char(u.ORDER_RECV_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') ORDER_RECV_DATE, u.STOREOUT_AMOUNT, u.ADVC_AMOUNT, u.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, u.REMARK, u.DEAL_FLAG, to_char(u.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEAL_TIME, u.DEAL_PSON_ID, u.DEAL_PSON_NAME, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_A u where u.STOREOUT_ID = #STOREOUT_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREOUT_DTL_ID, u.STOREOUT_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.NOTICE_NUM, u.REAL_NUM, u.PRICE, u.DECT_RATE, u.DECT_PRICE, u.DECT_AMOUNT, u.REMARK, u.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.PRD_TYPE, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.DEL_FLAG, a.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, a.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG from DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_DTL_A u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on a.SPCL_TECH_ID=u.SPCL_TECH_ID and a.USE_FLAG=1
sqlMap.select: select u.STOREOUT_ID, u.STOREOUT_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_ID, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, to_char(u.SALE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') SALE_DATE, u.SALE_PSON_ID, u.SALE_PSON_NAME, u.CUST_NAME, u.TEL, u.RECV_ADDR, to_char(u.ORDER_RECV_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') ORDER_RECV_DATE, u.STOREOUT_AMOUNT, u.ADVC_AMOUNT, u.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, u.REMARK, u.DEAL_FLAG, to_char(u.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEAL_TIME, u.DEAL_PSON_ID, u.DEAL_PSON_NAME, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_A u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_DTL_A( STOREOUT_DTL_ID, STOREOUT_ID, DEL_FLAG )values( #STOREOUT_DTL_ID#, #STOREOUT_ID#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_DTL_A set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREOUT_DTL_ID in ($STOREOUT_DTL_IDS$)
update DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_DTL_A set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREOUT_ID = #STOREOUT_ID:VARCHAR#
